titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the rate of duty on alpha-phenyl-2-piperdylacetic acid.
A bill to suspend temporarily the rate of duty on alpha-phenyl-2-piperdylacetic acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on alpha-phenyl-2-piperidylacetic acid.
